# üóÇÔ∏è LlamaIndex: Your Gateway to LLM-Powered Applications

**LlamaIndex is a powerful data framework that empowers developers to build intelligent, context-aware applications with Large Language Models (LLMs).** ([Original Repo](https://github.com/run-llama/llama_index))

[![PyPI - Downloads](https://img.shields.io/pypi/dm/llama-index)](https://pypi.org/project/llama-index/)
[![Build](https://github.com/run-llama/llama_index/actions/workflows/build_package.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/run-llama/llama_index/actions/workflows/build_package.yml)
[![GitHub contributors](https://img.shields.io/github/contributors/jerryjliu/llama_index)](https://github.com/jerryjliu/llama_index/graphs/contributors)

[![Reddit](https://img.shields.io/reddit/subreddit-subscribers/LlamaIndex?style=plastic&logo=reddit&label=r%2FLlamaIndex&labelColor=white)](https://www.reddit.com/r/LlamaIndex/)
[![Ask AI](https://img.shields.io/badge/Phorm-Ask_AI-%23F2777A.svg?&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,
## Key Features

*   **Data Connectors:** Seamlessly ingest data from various sources (APIs, PDFs, docs, SQL databases, etc.).
*   **Data Structuring:** Organize your data using efficient indices and graphs for optimal LLM interaction.
*   **Advanced Retrieval/Query Interface:** Easily query your data and receive context-aware, knowledge-augmented responses from LLMs.
*   **Flexible Integrations:** Integrate with popular frameworks like LangChain, Flask, Docker, and more.
*   **Beginner-Friendly and Customizable:** Provides a high-level API for ease of use, as well as lower-level APIs for advanced customization.

##  Getting Started
Choose your path:
1.  **Starter Package** (`llama-index`): A Python package including core LlamaIndex and integrations
2.  **Customized Approach** (`llama-index-core`): Install the core and add your desired integrations from [LlamaHub](https://llamahub.ai/)

**Installation (Starter Package):**
```bash
pip install llama-index
```

**Installation (Customized Approach):**
```bash
pip install llama-index-core
# Install integrations such as OpenAI LLM support:
pip install llama-index-llms-openai
```
## Examples
```python
# Import libraries
from llama_index.core import VectorStoreIndex, SimpleDirectoryReader
import os

# Set your OpenAI API key (if needed)
os.environ["OPENAI_API_KEY"] = "YOUR_OPENAI_API_KEY"

# Load documents from a directory
documents = SimpleDirectoryReader("YOUR_DATA_DIRECTORY").load_data()

# Create an index
index = VectorStoreIndex.from_documents(documents)

# Query the index
query_engine = index.as_query_engine()
response = query_engine.query("YOUR_QUESTION")

# Print the response
print(response)
```

## Resources

*   **Documentation:** [https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/](https://docs.llamaindex.ai/en/stable/)
*   **LlamaHub:**  [https://llamahub.ai](https://llamahub.ai) (Community library of data loaders)
*   **LlamaLab:** [https://github.com/run-llama/llama-lab](https://github.com/run-llama/llama-lab) (Cutting-edge AGI projects using LlamaIndex)
